movies.title: Videoclub
movies.plot: In 1992, a young man who works at a video store takes shelter in it (along with his friends and family) during a "possible" zombie invasion.
movies.simplePlot: In 1992, a young man who works at a video store takes shelter in it (along with his friends and family) during a "possible" zombie invasion.

biography.bio: Pedro Campos was born on September 17, 1988 in Austin, Texas, USA as Pedro Campos Di Girólamo. He is an actor, known for Graduados (2013), Pobre Gallo (2016) and Vuelve Temprano (2014).
biography.name: Pedro Campos

biography.bio: Luciana Echeverría was born on July 12, 1991 in Cauquenes City, Cauquenes, Maule, Chile as Luciana Andrea Echeverría Christie. She is an actress, known for Su Nombre es Joaquín (2011), Corazón Rebelde (2009) and La Poseída (2015).
biography.name: Luciana Echeverría

biography.bio: Francisca Díaz is an actress, known for Videoclub (2013) and Young and Wild (2012).
biography.name: Francisca Díaz

biography.placeOfBirth: Valdivia, XIV Región de Los Ríos, Chile
biography.bio: Samuel González was born on October 1, 1987 in Valdivia, XIV Región de Los Ríos, Chile as Samuel David González Vera. He is an actor, known for Mamá Mechona (2014), San Cristóbal (2015) and Manuel de Ribera (2010).
biography.name: Samuel González

biography.bio: Berta Lasala was born in 1973 in Iquique, Chile. She is an actress, known for Gatas & Tuercas (2005), Machos (2003) and Buen partido (2002).
biography.name: Berta Lasala

biography.bio: Daniel Alcaíno is an actor, known for Peleles (2011), Los 80 (2008) and Vértigo (2003).
biography.name: Daniel Alcaíno

biography.bio: Ingrid Cruz was born on July 1, 1975 in Antofagasta, Chile as Ingrid Elena Cruz Toro. She is an actress, known for Lola (2007), Pituca sin Luca$ (2014) and Pobre Gallo (2016). She has been married to Leonardo Scheinffelt since 2007. They have one child.
biography.name: Ingrid Cruz

biography.bio: Eyal Meyer was born on December 10, 1985 in Chile. He is an actor, known for Gloria (2013), Diego y Sebastián (2011) and Fuerzas Especiales (2014).
biography.name: Eyal Meyer

biography.bio: Cristobal Tapia Montt was born July 2nd 1981 in Santiago, Chile. His family moved to the United States barely a month after he was born. He spent most of his childhood between Greenwich CT and Tampa FL and moved back to Chile in 1989. Fluent in English and Spanish he started acting on Television at age 12. Known for his acting, illustrations and music, Cristobal has a unique approach on his characters and has demonstrated a solid performance on every project he has been a part of. After having a solid career in Chile, being cast in over nine TV shows for major Networks and several Films, he has recently settled in Los Angeles California in March of 2015. Cristobal has already landed three major roles. His first breakthrough performance in English as the brooding stranger "Martin" in Eli Roth's "The Stranger" opened his international career giving him amazing feedback on his work from prestigious media outlets all over the world. His work as Josh Harris in Ryan Gregory Phillip's "Shortwave" has given him vast exposure and a nomination for best supporting actor at Filmquest. His Guest Star role as Carlos Pereira for TNT's high end drama "Good Behavior" starring Michele Dockery and Juan Diego Botto has lead him into the world of television in the US with a important projection as a diverse actor. His most recent work will be seen in the Netflix Original "Madre" as it premieres internationally in October 2016.
biography.name: Cristobal Tapia Montt

biography.bio: Marcelina Acevedo is an actress, known for Videoclub (2013).
biography.name: Marcelina Acevedo

biography.bio: Soledad Acevedo is an actress, known for Videoclub (2013).
biography.name: Soledad Acevedo

biography.bio: Sebastián Layseca is an actor, known for Conde Vrolok (2009), Su Nombre es Joaquín (2011) and La vie des poissons (2010). He has been married to Carmen Gloria Bresky since 2004. They have two children.
biography.name: Sebastián Layseca

biography.bio: Felipe Ríos is an actor, known for El Club (2015), B-Happy, j'ai peur de rien (2003) and Neruda (2016).
biography.name: Felipe Ríos

biography.bio: Carmen Gloria Bresky was born on August 1, 1978 in Santiago, Chile. She is an actress, known for El Amor lo Manejo Yo (2014), Socias (2013) and Casado con Hijos (2006). She has been married to Sebastián Layseca since 2004. They have two children.
biography.name: Carmen Gloria Bresky

biography.bio: Gonzalo Muñoz-Lerner is an actor, known for Gringuito (1998), JPT: Justicia para todos (2004) and Videoclub (2013).
biography.name: Gonzalo Muñoz-Lerner
